channel.description: Recent content in math on Sumant Chess

item.title: Be Good at Math, Simple Techniques!
item.description: Be Good at Math, Simple Techniques! Many students feel they are not good at mathematics. It’s true, but only if you think it is! As a Rotocraft Engineer and a lecturer for engineering students, being good at mathematics is not an option. I have to solve engineering problems almost every day. When I was in primary school, I was fortunate not trapped in the myth that math is hard.
